Name: A Sun Of Salt
About the game: 太陽の塩 - A Sun Of Salt Unravel the mystery, the horror, and the people aboard your ship as captain of a small crew on a lifelong mission into the unknown. Game Features: Visual novel gameplay. Get to know an evolving cast of characters. Take part in a dramatic sci-fi tale that can turn from romance to horror in an instant. Unravel the true nature of your mission. Experience love, death, or friendship in branching paths that lead to one of 4 endings. Get a small glimpse into the mind of your crew with experimental technology.
Meta Title: A Sun Of Salt: Aug 28, 2018, NikuTreat and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on A Sun Of Salt? Check out the release date (Aug 28, 2018), developer insights from NikuTreat, and a complete game summary.
